Ask them about their daily routines and habits to understand their behavior and social structure better.
Ask them about their favorite foods, activities, and hobbies to learn more about their interests and preferences.
Ask them about their fears and anxieties to understand their emotions and help them overcome them.
Ask them about their communication styles and preferences to improve human-animal interactions.
Ask them about their perceptions of humans and their experiences with them to improve human-animal relationships.
